title: i got chat restricted for being flamed in a game.
body: so im playing league with someone from the discord server. and our jungler who was not partied with us proceeds to flame me after i die ONCE. i go ok cool im getting flamed. i proceed to try my best and yet again im dead, by this time im playing safe. but still, i get flamed. i proceed to move lanes to stop "feeding" their mid (only died to him twice in lane). then i kill olaf in top which makes feel slightly better. but alas he kills me and then i proceed to get flamed yet again. so im sitting here being flamed for trying my best and trying to defend myself against him, but IM chat Restricted. because someone forced their negative attitude onto me, even the enemy yasuo agreed that i was being flamed by our jungler who was playing shaco. but i guess playing a game to have FUN isn't possible anymore. i either get flamed and chat restricted or i have to resort to playing bots to boost my spirits. the rport system needs work.

replies.body: Somebody else flaming you "first" does not make it ok for you to flame back. You got chat restricted for what you typed **back** , not for any other reason

> [{quoted}](name=hinomoriAmu,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rWi16Gzb,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-03-29T15:09:34.655+0000)
>
> trying to defend myself against him, but IM chat Restricted

You got chat restricted for muting someone, moving on, and concentrating on the game? That's weird.
i did not flame back at all. i only defended myself. i said no mean things to anyone. and yet i get chat restricted

> i did not flame back at all. i only defended myself. i said no mean things to anyone.

Well, you got chat restricted, so either A. You didn't just "defend" yourself and broke the rules, or B. The punishment was issued in error. If you post your logs, we can give it peer review and point out what you may be missing, if anything.

But if you're just going to adamantly insist that you did nothing wrong and not work with us to try and better understand your punishment, we can't help you.

> [{quoted}](name=hinomoriAmu,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rWi16Gzb,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-03-29T16:39:40.685+0000)
>
> i did not flame back at all. i only defended myself. i said no mean things to anyone. and yet i get chat restricted

Show us the chat logs, because so many people are eagerly waiting for someone to post logs that contain no insults and no excessive arguing in the middle of a match, that resulted in a punishment. I would love to see that just so we can expose how bad it really is. Please post the logs. You could be the hero that exposes their tyranny.

As Voldymort said, you get punished for _your_ behavior, nobody else's. You weren't chat restricted for being flamed, you were chat restricted for flaming back.

If you want to discuss your punishment in more depth, I'd suggest you post your full, unedited chat logs, but elsewise, next time someone flames you, _mute them, report them, and move on._

Thats not how it works dude. If you retaliate with toxic shit, youre gonna be treated as someone saying toxic shit. Doesnt matter who started it. Mute flamers, or ignore them, and then report if you want to. It's all you can do.
